Innovatrics at Biometrics 2009 Conference & Exhibition , London 20.-22. October Innovatrics releases major upgrade to ExpressID AFIS fingerprint matching solution Innovatrics ExpressID AFIS SDK now available in our web shop, starting at 950,- EUR. Innovatrics fingerprint technology used in college crackdown on illegal migrants. Innovatrics adds support for Futronic FS 90 Fingerprint scanner in all PC products, which you can buy directly here . Innovatrics adds ILO SID fingerprint template support in all ANSI & ISO SDK products. Innovatrics released the industry's first Royalty-free Fingerprint SDK . Global fingerprint technology leader Innovatrics introduces support for Datastrip DSV handheld biometric terminals , which are designed for mission-critical ID verification programs. Innovatrics introduces one-stop shop where you can purchase everything you need to develop and deploy your fingerprint-enabled software application: Fingerprint SDKs, Runtime licenses and Fingerprint scanners – all at one place. Innovatrics Wins Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year 2008 in Innovations , Slovakia. This awards Innovatrics' technical innovation, market share and international expansion. Innovatrics Receives Coveted Frost and Sullivan 2008 Global Fingerprints Technology of the Year Award Innovatrics joins the DaonAdvantage™ Program . Server-Based Fingerprint Matching for AFIS ExpressID AFIS is a software matching server designed to power Automated Fingerprint Identification Systems (AFIS) for large-scale identification of people. ExpressID AFIS Enterprise contains single server architecture. It can match up to 1.5 million fingerprints per second. more... 950 EUR ExpressID AFIS Government contains parallel server architecture. It can match 1.5 million fingerprints per second on each matching computer. more... 3900 EUR Fingerprint SDK for Standard PC/Laptops IDKit PC SDK is a fast and easy-to-integrate software development kit, which allows you to add One-to-Many (1:N) fingerprint matching into your PC software application. more... FREE ANSI & ISO PC SDK is a fingerprint standards compliant software development kit, which can extract and match One-to-One (1:1) template standards ANSI/INCITS-378, ISO 19794-2 and ILO SID on PC. The accuracy of ANSI & ISO PC SDK has been certified by US Government NIST. more... 490 EUR Fingerprint SDK for Mobile and Embedded Platforms IDKit Mobile SDK is a fast and easy-to-integrate software development kit, which allows you to add One-to-Many (1:N) fingerprint matching into your software for WinCE or Linux mobile devices. more... 900 EUR ANSI & ISO Mobile SDK is a fingerprint standards compliant software development kit, which can extract and match One-to-One (1:1) template standards ANSI/INCITS-378, ISO 19794-2 and ILO SID on WinCE Mobile devices. The accuracy of ANSI & ISO PC SDK has been certified by US Government NIST. more... 1200 EUR You can use any fingerprint scanner with our software products. However, we have selected some high-quality fingerprint scanners , which you can buy directly from us. For feature-by-feature product comparison, please refer to the Product Comparison Table . ^ Top | Print page Copyright . The sun always shines on Innovatrics users, spread across all time zones.

About Innovatrics We are an independent, trusted partner for biometric identity management technology . To date, we have successfully completed over 500 projects in 80 countries and over a billion people have been biometrically processed using Innovatrics software. Proven Track Record of Trusted Biometric Projects Governments and businesses need to know their users and customers are who they say they are Our top-rated algorithms are designed to prevent ID fraud. From identifying criminals to checking liveness, our R&D team is a pioneer of the latest trends. You Are In Control The data of your users are always fully under your supervision, control and ownership. Our solutions support most hardware and software configurations. You can rely on our 20 years in the biometric business. After over 600 projects in over 80 countries, we can help you solve many difficult challenges. Delivering biometric solutions for over 20 years Innovatrics' global team of experts offers in-depth industry experience to deliver reliable biometric solutions. Our solutions have been deployed worldwide, addressing a wide range of use cases, from national ID management and voter registration to supporting some of the largest law enforcement agencies. We also provide identity verification for global consumer brands . We understand your challenges and are committed to meeting your needs. Establish accurate, large scale biometric registries for voter registration, ID issuance and other services. Our solutions contain some of the fastest algorithms in the world. Create and search large databases of fingerprints, faces, irises and DNA. Use them to quickly identify people or verify their identity with top-rated biometric algorithms. Prevent ID fraud and deepfakes using our top-rated biometric and liveness algorithms. Our solutions have been designed for fast, convenient user experience. Our biometric algorithms are some of the best in the business Since 2004, we ve consistently ranked among the best in the world based on biometric benchmark evaluations and certifications, including NIST MINEX III, NIST IREX, NIST FRVT, NIST ELFT and others. Innovatrics Results in the NIST ELFT Benchmark Top Spots in Iris Recognition Algorithms Belong to Innovatrics Best results accuracy & interoperability iBeta Presentation Attack Detection Conformance Level 1 & 2 Innovatrics: Top Performer in Every NIST FRVT Category Secure, integrated solutions with no vendor lock-in We are compatible with most technologies. Our customers are never forced to use specific hardware or software for our solutions. Our algorithms are highly efficient and can be ported to any platform and hardware – from smartcards to established OSes. Our solutions are developed with interconnectivity in mind. We provide a robust, well-documented API for easy integration. Our biometric solutions are shaping the world of today Multi‑Tenant Biometric ID Platform Transforms Healthcare in Congo From Entry to Exit: Real-Time Face Recognition Enhances Global Summit Safety Remote Identity Verification Modernizes National Pension Fund Management Multi-Gallery ABIS for Accurate Civil and Criminal Identification in Brazil Biometric Onboarding Breaks Down Barriers to Financial Inclusion for Banco Estado Chile's Clients Remote Identity Verification Opens Access to Thai eGovernment Services Enter the Most Biometric Building in the World The Most Biometric Building The Innovatrics headquarters redefines how buildings recognize, respond, and secure. It is not a prototype. It is fully operational. It is a space where architecture and biometric intelligence coexist quietly, invisibly, and without compromise. Let's get in touch!
